scripts.build: npm run build:config && npm run build:functions && npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:integration-test
scripts.build:functions: path-exists functions && cpy '**/*.js' '!**/*.test.js/' ../dist/functions --cwd functions --parents && npm run build:functions:zip
scripts.build:functions:zip: path-exists dist/functions && cd dist/functions && foreach -g '*/' -x 'cd #{name} && bestzip ../#{name}.zip * && cd .. && rimraf #{name}'
scripts.config:epcc: npm run config:epcc:datamodel && npm run config:epcc:integrations
scripts.config:epcc:datamodel: echo 'No EPCC data model changes required, skipping'
scripts.unconfig:epcc: npm run unconfig:epcc:datamodel && npm run unconfig:epcc:integrations
scripts.unconfig:epcc:datamodel: echo 'No EPCC data model changes need to be rolled back, skipping'
scripts.integration-test: echo 'No standalone integration test available, skipping'
